---
title: "Blogger JSON Feed"
---

If you want to search your post by label, you can use this link for "Blogger" label.

/feeds/posts/default/-/Blogger?alt=json

---

You can use updated-min parameter

https://design-coach-glossary.blogspot.com/feeds/posts/default?alt=json&updated-min=2020-03-14T15:15:00-14:00

---

JSON Feed API'de maksimum sonuçları belirlemek için max-results parametresini (ex: max-results=250) kullanın.

blogname.blogspot.com/feeds/posts/default?alt=json&max-results=250

---

JSON Feed API'de arama yapmak için q parametresini (ex: q=word) kullanın.

For posts: 
blogname.blogspot.com/feeds/posts/default?alt=json&q=word
For Pages:
blogname.blogspot.com/feeds/pages/default?alt=json&q=word
